short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Visually emphasize stories on HN by changing font size according to the number of points (upvotes) and comments

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly triage Hacker News to determine popular items. Items will be bigger or smaller based on their popularity which help you visually skim the list of link and focus on the ones you are interested in.
